title: detect aerospace path
author: acsandmann

comments.body: That works beautifully but for some reason not when I have it installed using "make install", idk if it is because it isnt running afterwards or smth.

@FormalSnake I think the latest commit fixed the issue with make install. When installing from the makefile it automatically adds it into launchctl and I think in that context it doesn't have access to where/which so I switched it to `command -v aerospace` and that seems to be working.

satisfaction_conditions: A solution that works when installed via 'make install'
A method to properly detect the aerospace path in different execution contexts
Compatibility with the system's launch control mechanism
